{{cpp/chrono/year_month_weekday_last/title|year_month_weekday_last}}
{{cpp/chrono/year_month_weekday_last/navbar}}
{{dcl begin}}
{{dcl|since=c++20|
constexpr
year_month_weekday_last( const std::chrono::year&amp; y, const std::chrono::month&amp; m,
                         const std::chrono::weekday_last&amp; wdl ) noexcept;
}}
{{dcl end}}

Constructs a {{tt|year_month_weekday_last}} object storing the year {{c|y}}, the month {{c|m}}, and the weekday {{c|wdl.weekday()}}. The constructed object represents the last weekday of that year and month.

===Notes===
A {{tt|year_month_weekday_last}} can also be created by combining one of the partial-date types {{lc|std::chrono::year_month}} and {{lc|std::chrono::month_weekday_last}} with the missing component ({{lc|std::chrono::weekday_last|weekday_last}} and {{lc|std::chrono::year|year}}, respectively) using {{c|operator/}}.
